effect: **Inherited Effect** — Whenever CARDNAME attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 [POWER] until end of turn. *(Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)*
effect_raw: Inherited Effect — Whenever Jin attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 POWER until end of turn. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)

effect_html: Inherited Effect — Whenever Jin attacks with a Polearm weapon and/or Polearm attack card, target Horse or Human ally you control gets +1 until end of turn. (Your champion has this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)

"A lily pad is but a weed in a pond of lotuses."

effect: **On Enter:** You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. *(Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)*
effect_raw: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)
name: Kongming, Wayward Maven

rule.description: Shifting Mastery is not an object and cannot be targeted by any effects.

effect_html: On Enter: You gain the Shifting Currents mastery. (Players can only have one mastery. The Shifting Currents mastery has four modes: North, South, East, and West. Some cards benefit from certain directions of Shifting Currents. Starts in the North direction.)

effect:
**Kongming Lineage** *(Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.)* 

**On Enter:** **Empower 3**.

**Inherited Effect** — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Kongming Lineage (Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.) 

On Enter: Empower 3.

Inherited Effect — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.
name: Kongming, Ascetic Vice
effect_html: Kongming Lineage (Kongming, Ascetic Vice must be leveled from a previous level "Kongming" champion.) On Enter: Empower 3.Inherited Effect — Whenever your Shifting Currents change from facing North to South, draw a card.

effect:
**Kongming Lineage**

**On Enter:** **Recover X**, where **X** is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment.

Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.
effect_raw:
Kongming Lineage

On Enter: Recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment.

Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.
name: Kongming, Fel Eidolon

rule.description: Changing adjacent directions means the currents can only go one step in a cardinal direction. For example, north can go either east or west whereas east can only go north or south.

effect_html: Kongming LineageOn Enter: Recover X, where X is the amount of tera element cards in your banishment.Whenever you activate a Spell card, you may change the direction of your Shifting Currents to an adjacent direction of your choice.

effect:
**Divine Relic** *(You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)*

**Banish CARDNAME:** All basic elements are enabled for you until end of turn. *(Fire, water, and wind are basic elements.)*
effect_raw:
Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)

Banish Imperial Seal: All basic elements are enabled for you until end of turn. (Fire, water, and wind are basic elements.)
name: Imperial Seal

rule.description: Imperial Seal will not change the element of your champion, and therefore won't grant Element Bonuses for basic elements.

effect_html: Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.)Banish Imperial Seal: All basic elements are enabled for you until end of turn. (Fire, water, and wind are basic elements.)

effect:
As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. 

[Class Bonus] **On Attack:** You may discard a fire element card and have CARDNAME deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, this attack gets +2 [POWER] and gains "**On Champion Hit:** Draw a card."
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. 

[Class Bonus] On Attack: You may discard a fire element card and have Dragon's Dawn deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, this attack gets +2 POWER and gains "On Champion Hit: Draw a card."

effect_html: As an additional cost to materialize this card, banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. Class Bonus On Attack: You may discard a fire element card and have Dragon's Dawn deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion. If you do, this attack gets +2 and gains "On Champion Hit: Draw a card."

effect:
**Hindered** *(This object enters the field rested)*

[REST]**: Empower 2**. Activate this ability only if your Shifting Currents face East or West.

[REST], **Banish CARDNAME:** **Empower X**, where **X** is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only at slow speed and only if your Shifting Currents face North or South.
effect_raw:
Hindered (This object enters the field rested)

REST: Empower 2. Activate this ability only if your Shifting Currents face East or West.

REST, Banish Ebbing Tide: Empower X, where X is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only at slow speed and only if your Shifting Currents face North or South.
name: Ebbing Tide
effect_html: Hindered (This object enters the field rested): Empower 2. Activate this ability only if your Shifting Currents face East or West., Banish Ebbing Tide: Empower X, where X is the amount of water element cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only at slow speed and only if your Shifting Currents face North or South.

effect:

[Level 2+] Allies you control with a buff counter on them lose pride.

effect:
**Stealth** *(This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by **true sight**.)*

[Class Bonus] CARDNAME's attacks can't be retaliated.

If a unit hit by CARDNAME this turn would die, banish it instead.

Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)

[Class Bonus] Xiao Qiao's attacks can't be retaliated.

If a unit hit by Xiao Qiao this turn would die, banish it instead.

rule.description: Units banished by Xiao Qiao's ability do not trigger their On Death abilities.

rule.description: If Three Visits is in a banishment and is then turned face down due to an effect like Orb of Sealing's, its owner can still activate it because that player is allowed to look at that card and see the ability that grants the activation permission.

rule.description: 'Rest your champion. If you do, glimpse 2 and recover 2. -> Glimpse 2 and recover 2.'
